# Overwhelm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Beguiler Spells|Beguiler 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 120

*You grip the creature’s head, and a surge of magical energy overwhelms its senses.*

With a touch, you deal nonlethal damage to the subject equal to the creature’s current hit point total.
